name: fnexd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fn]c1, c1 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: If the domain of a function is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
